lines.text:
[Mäkilä gives a salted herring to Hietanen suffering from hangover]
Thanks! I will manage the next half a year with this!
How does it feel to shoot a human-being?
I don't know. I have only shoot the enemies.
The wise men say that they aren't.

[when being shot in the chest]
It's on the left... The heart is on the left side!
You fucking bastard! What are you making faces for?
I'm not making faces, Corporal Sir!
Corporal Sir! Corporal Sir! You won't get away with me by calling me 'Sir'!
he eats iron and shits chain!

[the Finnish soldiers have just invaded Petrozavodsk]
Why did you come here? Why didn't you let us be alone?
The Soviet Union won the war but the little and tough Finland became second.
Rokka, Antero. I ain't got no second name.
